content:
The issue is not with the Thunderbird 147.0 dmg download but due to you using the old EOL macOS 10.13

Thunderbird and Firefox versions from 116.0 to current 147.0 requires macOS 10.15 (ten.fifteen) or later to run.

Thunderbird 115.18.0esr was the last to support macOS 10.12, 10.13, 10.14

You can go to https://archive.mozilla.org/pub/thunderbird/releases/115.18.0/mac/ then pick your language folder then download the Thunderbird 115.18.0.dmg
creator: James

content: You can copy the file, but not import it That is, you can, with thunderbird not running, copy from one profile and place into another. If everything in the second profile is identical, the filters should work. Fortunately, the file is a simple text file that can be manipulated with a text editor, such as Notepad. I don't mean to oversimplify the process; some setups with complex filters need careful tweaks to work properly. The SAFE way is to copy the complete profile, not just the filters. Good luck.
creator: davidsk
